Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.decks

Class PlayingDeck<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.decks.Deck<T>
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.decks.PlayingDeck<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of cards the deck is made of
Direct Known Subclasses:
DrawableDeck
public class PlayingDeck<T> extends Deck<T>
Class representing decks used during the whole game. Objective cards deck is PlayingDeck object.
